member.name: D3D12_BARRIER_SUBRESOURCE_RANGE
member.summary: Allows you to transition logically-adjacent ranges of subresources.

member.name: D3D12_BARRIER_SUBRESOURCE_RANGE.IndexOrFirstMipLevel
member.summary: The index of the first mip level in the range; or a subresource index, if NumMipLevels is zero. If a subresource index, then you can use the value 0xffffffff to specify all subresources.

member.name: D3D12_BARRIER_SUBRESOURCE_RANGE.NumMipLevels
member.summary: Number of mip levels in the range, or zero to indicate that IndexOrFirstMipLevel is a subresource index.

member.name: D3D12_BARRIER_SUBRESOURCE_RANGE.FirstArraySlice
member.summary: Index of first array slice in the range. Ignored if NumMipLevels is zero.

member.name: D3D12_BARRIER_SUBRESOURCE_RANGE.NumArraySlices
member.summary: Number of array slices in the range. Ignored if NumMipLevels is zero.

member.name: D3D12_BARRIER_SUBRESOURCE_RANGE.FirstPlane
member.summary: First plane slice in the range. Ignored if NumMipLevels is zero.

member.name: D3D12_BARRIER_SUBRESOURCE_RANGE.NumPlanes
member.summary: Number of plane slices in the range. Ignored if NumMipLevels is zero.
